portfolio.title: Amount2Words
portfolio.description: A web application built with ASP.NET MVC that converts numeric amounts into English currency words. Includes a full test suite and documentation.

portfolio.title: FinShark API
portfolio.description: A financial data API providing stock and market index information, featuring caching, pagination, and RESTful design.

portfolio.title: Photo Gallery
portfolio.description: A responsive image gallery that integrates with the Unsplash API to search and display photos with lazy loading and error handling.

portfolio.title: Instagram UI Clone
portfolio.description: A responsive Instagram-style web interface built with Chakra UI, featuring profile view, post grid, and navigation components.
